revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: In the name of our Lord and Master, Jesus Christ, our God and Savior, in the second year of the reign of our most godly and pious sovereign and greatest [l. 5] benefactor Flavius Herakleios, eternal Augustus and Emperor, 30 Tybi, 15th indiction. Aurelius Georgios, son of Phoibammon, whose mother is Isis, with me, [l. 10] Serenos, son of Sourous, whose mother is a different Isis, native of the holdings of the Great Tarouthinos of the Oxyrhynchite nome, as guarantor, to Aurelius Phib, doorkeeper of the church of [l. 15] St. Theorodoros, son of Apphouas from the city of Oxyrhynchos. I acknowledge that I have received from you at once three solidi in gold on the private standard, totals 3 solidi in gold [l. 20] on the private standard, which I agree to give back to you . . . [verso] [l. 22] Contract. Aurelius Georgios, son of Phoibammon, with guarantor . . .
